title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Visitor Center restrooms are accessible. Trail accessibility is limited because of terrain. No wheelchairs or strollers on the Island Trail, due to steep grades and many steps. The Rim Trail is accessible to the first overlook; beyond that point, it does not fully meet accessibility standards, but may be possible with assistance. Please contact the park for specific information to meet your needs.
